statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.BankName , AA.AccountNo , AA.Depositor , AA.Description , AA.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.TCustomerBank AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.BankName , AA.AccountNo , AA.Depositor , AA.Description , AA.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.TCustomerBank AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TCustomerBank ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, CustomerID, BankName, AccountNo, Depositor, Description, ImageUrl ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #CustomerID#, #BankName#, #AccountNo#, #Depositor#, #Description#, #ImageUrl# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TCustomerBank SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, CustomerID = #CustomerID# , BankName = #BankName# , AccountNo = #AccountNo# , Depositor = #Depositor# , Description = #Description# , ImageUrl = #ImageUrl# WHERE ID = #ID#
